name: SHADOW-XTECH
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by Black-Tappy

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number for bot.

PREFIX.description: Paste your bot prefix. Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: Select your bot work type: public-private-inbox-group.

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Make false if you want private mode.

DESCRIPTION.description: Add caption for menu and other.

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Add URL for mention reply and menu image.

WELCOME.description: Make true if want welcome and goodbye messages.

ADMIN_EVENTS.description: Make true to detect promote/demote events.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_LINK_KICK.description: Make true to kick members sending links.

DELETE_LINKS.description: Remove links from group automatically without removing member.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make true if you want bot auto delete bad words.

ANTI_VV.description: Make true to disable view once messages.

ANTICALL.description: Make true to block calls automatically.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Change it to 'same' if you want resend deleted message in same chat.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Make true for automatic status reaction.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make true for auto reply on status.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make true if want automatic voice reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make true if you want automatic sticker.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make true if you want react on every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make true if you want custom reactions.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make true if you want auto recording presence.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make true if you want auto typing presence.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make true if want always online.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make true if you want bot read all messages.

READ_CMD.description: Make true if want mark commands as read.
